INSOMNEA art

Abyss_03

I designed the concept for this character and the spaceship below in a game module in the fourth semester during my studies. Abyss_03 is the title of the game. You can find out more about the game itself under games.

The character belongs to the Assavi race. The Assavi live on the desert planet Urusvak and are equipped for extreme temperatures and strong wind storms. The suit is designed for agility and the jetpack is used for locomotion.

Inspired by robber flies, powerful desert flies, I made the concept for our spaceship. The small ships in front and on the sides serve as shield projectors. The two pairs of wings are used to control the direction of the ship. There are two pairs of retractable legs on the bottom.
